Articles.Content:
Long time lurker here. Figured it was about time to sign up for this and maybe hit up some challenges. Dont know exactly what version I started playing but it was quite a while before career or science mode for that matter. I've got a couple hundred hours on it and Im still horrible, lol. Im more of a sandbox player myself. Its funny, I wanted career so bad now that its pretty functional with money and everything I would just rather set my own goals on what I feel like doing without worrying about science and cash (stranding jeb on laythe comes to mind)

I like mods like near/far, deadly re-entry, remote tech, kas, etc. Tend to stay away from parts packs. I like KW rocketry but never use it anymore, b9 has *way* too many parts for my taste.

Anyway thanks for having me and I look forward to getting a bit more involved with the community here. This is definitely the best steam early access I ever went for and also one of the best games to come out in a long time for me, and we arent even in the beta phase yet.
I play career as a lead-up to what is essentially sandbox in the later stages. Welcome to the forum.
